data.prayer: Jesus, make the 3,564 people in the state of Saint Martin who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint Martin, Guernsey

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of Saint Martin to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 babies will be born in the next month to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Saint Martin, Guernsey.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Saint Martin, Guernsey to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Please, convict the 2,904 believers in Saint Martin, Guernsey to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 2,904 believers in the state of Saint Martin the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Saint Martin. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Saint Martin to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.section_summary:
the state of Saint Martin, Guernsey has a population of 6,600.

We estimate Saint Martin has 2,904 people who might know Jesus, 3,564 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 132 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2 neighbors who need Jesus.
